song_lyrics: Sant samāgam re, shuddha thaī kījīe re,
Sant thakī lījīe vivek vichār re;
Kapaṭ kubuddhi re, ur thakī ṭāḷīe re,
Ṭāḷīe jūṭho tan ahankār re... Sant° 1
Sant jan sange re, Hariguṇ grahīe re,
Avaguṇ ur thakī karīe tyāg re;
Īrṣhyā abhāv re, na levo santno re,
Tansukh tajavā grahī vairāgya re... Sant° 2
Krodh na karavo re, Harijan upare re,
Vachan suṇī nav bāndhavu ver re;
Samajī vichārī re, vachan mukhe bolīe re,
Vaṇ samaje na vāvīe zer re... Sant° 3
Shrī Narāyaṇ re, Swāmīnā dās je re,
Tene sange rahevu thaīne gulām re;
Muktānand kahe chhe re, evī rīte vartatā re,
Sant sange pāmasho Akṣhardhām re... Sant° 4
title: Sant samāgam re shuddha thaī kījīe re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-611: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
